title: Gray River
blocka: Action: Convert any number of timber dice into fortune dice.

title: Mirror Woods, Magical
blockb: Immediate: Spend 8 progress to raise timber track by one.
blockc: (DISASTER) Test: Survival 3. Failure: All characters are weary.

title: Exposed Overlook
blockb: Action: Spend progress. 4: +1 timber die. 7: +2 timber dice. 9: +3 timber dice. 10: +4 timber dice.
blockc: (CALAMITY) A fire breaks out! Lose all progress on this location.

title: Musty Tomb
blocka: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 Lore.
blockb: (SORCERY) Test: Lore 2. Failure: One character is shaken.

title: The Necromancer
blockb: Action: Test Lore 3. Success: Burn card. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (WEIRD) Staging Area: +3 Discord. Location: Character with lowest Combat at location is Wounded.

title: Searching the Banks
blockc: Immediate: Spend 6 progress. Move to stage 1. Burn card.

title: Restless Dead
blockb: Action: Test Combat 2. Sucess: Burn card. Failure: + 1 Discord.

title: Scouting Ahead
blockc: Immediate: Spend 5 progress. Move to stage 2. Burn card.

title: Clearing the Dark Woods
blockc: Immediate: Spend 6 progress. Complete mission path. Burn card.

title: Hall of Traps
blockc: Immediate: Spend 3 progress. Move to stage 1. Burn card.

title: The Runeward
blockc: Immediate: Spend 6 progress. Move to stage 2. Burn card.

title: The Necromancer's Dark Heart
blockc: Immediate: Spend 7 progress. Complete mission path. Burn card.

title: Restless Dead
blockb: Action: Test Combat 2. Sucess: Burn card. Failure: + 1 Discord.

title: Food Source
blocka: Interrupt: +2 Food. Roll dice and add to pool.

title: Timber Source
blocka: Interrupt: +2 Timber. Roll dice and add to pool.

title: Timber Source
blocka: Interrupt: +2 Timber. Roll dice and add to pool.

title: Ore Source
blocka: Interrupt: +2 Ore. Roll dice and add to pool.

title: Mana Source
blocka: Interrupt: +2 Mana. Roll dice and add to pool.

title: Engines of Progress
blocka: Interrupt: Make a Red Bank Conquest test. For every success, place one progress in any Red Bank wilderness location.

title: Poisonous Dusk Frogs
blocka: Immediate: Test Solo Combat 1. Success: +1 Combat. Burn card. Failure: Exhausted.

title: Forest Boar
blocka: Immediate: Test Lowest Combat 1. Failure: Weary.

title: Libram of Animation
blocka: Immediate: Test Solo Lore 1. Success: +1 Lore. Burn card. Failure: Angry.

title: Restless Dead
blockb: Action: Test Combat 2. Sucess: Discard. Failure: + 1 Discord.

title: Restless Dead
blockb: Action: Test Combat 2. Sucess: Discard. Failure: + 1 Discord.

title: Grueling Wilds
blocka: Placement: On character with lowest Survival.
blockc: On Movement: If character moves out of North Oaks location, remove condition.
